name: SpeedRunners
overview: Grapple your friends to outrun them in this competitive multiplayer platformer! In a city filled with superheroes, getting to crimes becomes a competition on its own. Fortunately, there are enough rockets, bombs, grappling hooks, spikes and other goodies lying around to make the competition fun and fast. Welcome to SpeedRunners! SpeedRunners is a 4-player competitive platformer with grappling hooks, power-ups, and interactive environments. Run, jump, swing around, fire rockets and grapple onto your opponents to knock them off screen!
